subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3739 is out for delivery
description_text:
Good day Simsonn

Thank you so much for the fast shipping. The quality AAA ! However, it missing the upgrade brakes kit , the vam pro linear haptic motor  x 2 and the brackets for the haptic x2. Are they ship separately ?

Regards

Derek Ng

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.

conversations.body_text: Hi derek ng,  We ship the items separately as they cannot be packaged together. Once the logistics tracking number for the vibration motor is confirmed, our operations team will get back to you.

Thank you very much for the quick response!!

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________

Hi Simsonn

I have been following the second order for the brake kit up grade and the haptic motors. The SF express can't find anything from the tracking # provided. Did something happened to my order ?

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________
Hi derek ng,  Here is the tracking number : JSEKB2469389870YQ. You can track it via https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=JSEKB2469389870YQ

Good day Simsonn

Hope all is well. Tho the tracking says the package delivered. I only receive the haptic motors but not the upgrade brake kits. Is there another shipment ?



Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________
